intension: Design a Facebook ad to promote a lunch event featuring delicious food, including fruit cake and strawberries. Encourage people to accept the invitation and join for a leisurely lunch with friends.
globalcaption: The image features a dining table with a variety of food items on it. There are several slices of cake, with one prominently placed on the table and others scattered around. A bowl is also present on the table, likely containing more cake or other treats.\n\nIn addition to the cake, there are a few oranges placed on the table, adding a touch of color and freshness to the scene. The overall setting appears to be a casual and inviting gathering, with the food items suggesting a delightful lunch or tea party.
keywords: food, lunch, fruit, cake, strawberries, leisure, meal, table, delicious, facebook, ad, fb, advertisement

bglayer.bgcaption: The image features a dining table with a white plate holding a slice of cake. The cake is topped with strawberries and blueberries, creating a visually appealing dessert. There are also a few more slices of cake on the table, with one placed closer to the edge and another one further back.\n\nIn addition to the cake, there is a bowl on the table, possibly containing more fruit or other treats. A fork is also present on the table, likely for enjoying the cake. The overall scene suggests a delicious and inviting dessert spread
